DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are studying the impact of RPh201 on chronic vegetative patients. RPh201 has been reported to induce neuronal regeneration in animal models. Evaluation will be done by combining clinical /behavioral assessment with fMRI studies.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of RPh201 on CVS Patients: Clinical and fMRI Measurements
DOC.criteria: Chronic vegetative patients Inability to go through an MRI scans (i.e. metal implants, neurotransmitters)and pregnancy
